allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$image = [System.Drawing.Image]::FromFile\(''C:\\Users\\Nav\\Downloads\\personal\\roundtableapp\\Icons\\roundtable.png''\)

# 32x32
$resized = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\(32, 32\)
$g = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($resized\)
$g.DrawImage\($image, 0, 0, 32, 32\)
$g.Dispose\(\)
$resized.Save\(''C:\\Users\\Nav\\downloads\\personal\\roundtableapp\\src-tauri\\icons\\32x32.png''\)
$resized.Dispose\(\)
Write-Host ''32x32 created''

# 128x128
$resized = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\(128, 128\)
$g = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($resized\)
$g.DrawImage\($image, 0, 0, 128, 128\)
$g.Dispose\(\)
$resized.Save\(''C:\\Users\\Nav\\downloads\\personal\\roundtableapp\\src-tauri\\icons\\128x128.png''\)
$resized.Dispose\(\)
Write-Host ''128x128 created''

# 256x256 \(128x128@2x\)
$resized = New-Object System.Drawing.Bitmap\(256, 256\)
$g = [System.Drawing.Graphics]::FromImage\($resized\)
$g.DrawImage\($image, 0, 0, 256, 256\)
$g.Dispose\(\)
$resized.Save\(''C:\\Users\\Nav\\downloads\\personal\\roundtableapp\\src-tauri\\icons\\128x128@2x.png''\)
$resized.Dispose\(\)
Write-Host ''256x256 created''

$image.Dispose\(\)
")
